Text: Thanks very much.... great nostalgic stuff, John Peel was the soundtrack to my teens in the 70's. Outside of the London punk clubs, his show was pretty much the only place I could get to hear the music I was in to.

superb call - thanks for the download. 
This Peel show was responsible for getting a lot of English kids into Punk during the 70s and away from the likes of Yes and Led Zep. 1977 was to be a memorable year in Britain.
"No Elvis, Beatles or the Rolling Stones."
